Anonymous Bitcoin Web Hosting

How it works? Give us your email and domain name, we will set up your account for you and email you your cPanel and FTP access. Please get in touch with us if you didn’t receive your account details in 24 hours after your order was finished.

For the love of all that is holy, read our TOS and AUP before you order. We are anonymous bitcoin web host but we will still suspend your account if you breach our TOS and AUP.

Need help?

  • check out our docs

  • get in touch with us on Gitter chat

  • send us an email

Domain Transfer

You will have to point your domain name to our nameservers yourself. We will send you an email with instructions on how to do that.
If you don't have a domain name yet, get one now.

Primary Domain Setup

You should also decide whether your primary domain will be a static website or a Ghost blog. In case of Ghost we will set up the blog for you. If you opt for Jekyll or a static website, you're fully in charge of the set up.

By completing the order you are accepting our TOS and AUP.

Pick a domain name

Free Domain Registration

Pick a domain name and fill in the form below.
We can only register a non-premium .com domain.
We also reserve the right to decline a domain registration without any explanation.

For technical reasons, domain registration on our behalf is only available for annual plans.

Primary Domain Setup

You should also decide whether your primary domain will be a static website or a Ghost blog. In case of Ghost we will set up the blog for you. If you opt for Jekyll or a static website, you're in charge of the set up.

By completing the order you are accepting our TOS and AUP.
